column6: With an intergalactic empire headed by the Shi'ar and the Kree on the verge of conquering the galaxy, Captain Marvel gives them 7 days to get their affairs in order... because he's going to kill them all!  32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Neal Adams | penciller:Paul Azaceta | writer:Peter David
